Replying to @ChrisFerdinandi 2018-03-15 11:41
@ChrisFerdinandi I like to default the "previous slide" button to "previous build" for easily stepping backwards through complex slides. Then I add a less obvious "previous slide button". Also a movie play/pause for halting a demo video as I talk them through. And one to reset the timer.
